testCases.name: Authenticate with valid user credentials
testCases.description: Enter a valid username and password and perform the login operation, ensuring the user is successfully authenticated and redirected to the main application area.

steps.name: Navigate to Swag Labs login page
Enter a valid username in the Username input field
Enter the corresponding password in the Password input field
Click the Login button to submit the credentials
Verify user is redirected to the inventory/products page

testCases.name: Add product to cart from product listing
testCases.description: From the inventory or product listing page, select a product and add it to the shopping cart, verifying that the cart reflects the addition.

steps.name: Click the 'Add to cart' button for Sauce Labs Backpack on the product listing page
Verify the cart icon displays a badge with '1' after adding the product

testCases.name: Navigate to cart and review contents
testCases.description: Access the shopping cart view from the application menu or cart icon and verify the list of added products, including item details and quantities.

steps.name: Click the shopping cart icon in the header to navigate to the cart page
Verify the page displays a heading indicating the cart view
Verify the cart page displays a row for each product added, showing product name, price, and quantity

data.value: Each cart item row includes product name, price, and quantity information.

testCases.name: Logout and invalidate user session
testCases.description: Initiate the logout flow through the application menu or user controls and confirm the user session is terminated with a return to the login interface.

steps.name: Open the main menu using the menu open button
Click the "Logout" link in the sidebar menu
Verify that the login page is displayed after logout by asserting the presence of the login button

userStories.userStoryName: Secure User Login and Feedback on Invalid Attempts

testCases.name: Login with valid credentials
testCases.description: Authenticate using a valid username and correct password and verify redirection to the product catalog.

testCases.name: Login with invalid credentials
testCases.description: Attempt to log in with an invalid username or password and verify that an informative error message is displayed and the user remains on the login page.

testCases.name: Login form validation and field presence
testCases.description: Ensure the login form displays properly with username, password, and login button, and that all input fields are required for submission.

userStories.userStoryName: Product Listing, Browsing, Sorting, and Cart Addition

testCases.name: View all available products after login
testCases.description: After successful login, verify the complete list of products (including image, title, price, and description) is displayed on the products page.

testCases.name: Sort product listing using the dropdown
testCases.description: Use the sort dropdown to change sort order (by price or name) and verify the listing updates without a page refresh.

testCases.name: Add a product to the shopping cart
testCases.description: Click the 'Add to cart' button for a product and verify the cart icon updates to reflect the addition.

testCases.name: Product remains in cart after addition
testCases.description: Verify that the product added to the cart persists until checkout or app reset.

userStories.userStoryName: Shopping Cart Access, Review, and Quantity Tracking

testCases.name: Access shopping cart page
testCases.description: From the inventory page, click the cart icon to navigate to the cart summary and confirm it lists added products with details and quantities.

testCases.name: Cart item count reflects additions
testCases.description: Verify the cart iconâ€™s item count increments accurately as products are added from the product listing.

testCases.name: Proceed to checkout from cart page
testCases.description: Confirm that users can proceed to the checkout flow from the shopping cart summary page after reviewing their selected items.

userStories.userStoryName: App Navigation via Menu: Inventory Access, Logout, and State Reset

testCases.name: Open sidebar menu and access inventory, about, or reset functions
testCases.description: Open the sidebar menu and interact with Inventory, About, or Reset App State to verify correct view redirection or state reset actions.

testCases.name: Logout via sidebar and session termination
testCases.description: Click on the Logout item in the sidebar menu and confirm the user session is ended and the login page is displayed.

testCases.name: Reset app state using the menu
testCases.description: Select 'Reset App State' from the sidebar menu and verify cart contents and inventory views return to default state.

testCases.name: Footer social link presence and accuracy
testCases.description: Verify that the footer contains labeled links for Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

testCases.name: Each social channel link opens official page in new tab
testCases.description: Click on each social media footer link and confirm it opens the correct official Sauce Labs channel in a new browser tab.
